mapper.select: SELECT order_id as orderId, user_id as userId, order_date as orderDate, is_purchased as isPurchased FROM `order` WHERE 1=1 AND user_id = #{username}

SELECT SUM(sub_total) FROM ( SELECT ta.order_id, tc.price*tb.quantity sub_total FROM `order` ta LEFT JOIN order_detail tb ON ta.order_id = tb.order_id LEFT JOIN item tc ON tb.item_id = tc.item_id ) ta WHERE ta.order_id = #{orderId}
